ru.cos.sim.road.link
Class Segment

java.lang.Object
  ru.cos.sim.road.link.Segment
Direct Known Subclasses:
TrapeziumSegment
public abstract class Segment
extends Object

Segment is a peace of one way road with uniform segmentGeometryData, i.e. straight, circle or something else. Segment contains array of lanes, in the segment number of lanes is constant.

Author:
zroslaw

public abstract float calculateAdjacentPosition(int laneIndex,
                                                float position,
                                                Hand hand)
Calculate next (adjacent) position on next (left or right) lane.

Parameters:
laneIndex - index of lane from which to calculate position on next lane
position - position on current lane
hand - hand of next lane
Returns:
appropriate position on next lane
